      • isDoubleExpanding

        public boolean isDoubleExpanding()
        Determines whether RuntimeConfigurable.maybeConfigure(Project, boolean) will reevaluate this property. For compatibility reasons (#52621) it will, though for most applications (#42046) it should not.
        Returns:
        true if expanding twice (the default), false for just once
        Since:
        Ant 1.8.3
